title: vaLLik-kaNavanE
sahitya:
vaLLik-kaNavanE vaDivElavanE puLLik-kaLApa mayil Erum muruganE


anupallavi

  paLLi koLLum pARkkaDal perumAn maruganE pArvati maganE parindaruL paNDitanE


caraNam    alaiyADum sendilil viLaiyADum vIranE malai engilum tangum mAdEvan maindanE
talai AraDan tigazhum tiru kArtikEyanE shila vEDanE sirakkum singAranE taNigai
